product_overview: Biodiagnóstico is an advanced integrated platform designed for smart laboratory management, combining financial auditing, analytical quality control, AI-powered data analysis, and real-time executive dashboards to modernize and optimize the workflows of Laboratório Biodiagnóstico.
core_goals: Automate and accurately reconcile financial reports from Compulab and SIMUS systems to identify discrepancies that lead to financial losses.
Provide a robust analytical quality control module using Westgard rules and interactive Levey-Jennings charts for real-time monitoring.
Enhance data analysis through an AI-driven assistant that delivers conversational insights and automatic trend detection using Google Gemini.
Visualize key financial and quality metrics on an easy-to-understand executive dashboard for timely decision-making.
Offer utility tools to convert PDFs to Excel and maintain the platform effectively.
key_features: Financial Audit module allowing users to upload PDF reports from Compulab and SIMUS, automatically comparing data to detect missing patients, uncoded exams, and value discrepancies with detailed Excel report generation.
Quality Control system with automated Westgard rule validation, management of exam metrics (mean, standard deviation), and interactive Levey-Jennings charts for visualizing data variability.
AI-powered Data Detective assistant enabling conversational queries about financial and quality data, generating automated insights, and using context-optimized prompts to minimize hallucinations.
Executive Dashboard providing real-time KPIs and visualization of financial and quality metrics to support managerial decision-making.
Utility Tools including a fast PDF to Excel converter and maintenance utilities for platform upkeep.
user_flow_summary: User logs into the platform and accesses the Financial Audit section to upload monthly PDF reports from Compulab and SIMUS.
The system automatically compares uploaded reports, identifies discrepancies such as missing patients, uncoded exams, and financial mismatches, then generates detailed Excel reports for review.
In the Quality Control section, the user monitors exam data with validation against Westgard quality control rules and visualizes results through Levey-Jennings charts.
User interacts with the AI Data Detective assistant by conversing and querying insights about the financial or quality data, receiving automated trend analyses and corrective suggestions.
Managers review consolidated KPIs and metrics in the Executive Dashboard to make informed decisions based on real-time data visualizations.
Users utilize the utility tools to convert PDF reports into Excel and perform platform maintenance tasks as needed.
validation_criteria: The platform correctly identifies all financial discrepancies between Compulab and SIMUS PDF reports, including missing patients and exam coding errors, with no false negatives.
Westgard rules and quality control validations are applied accurately, and Levey-Jennings charts correctly represent quality data variability.
AI Data Detective responses are contextually relevant, accurate, and free from hallucinations due to optimized prompt engineering.
Executive Dashboard displays up-to-date KPIs and metrics with real-time refresh and accurate data representation.
Utility tools perform PDF to Excel conversions without data loss and maintain system integrity during maintenance operations.
System performance remains stable and responsive under expected usage loads with consistent uptime.
